author: dlr
msg: Fix bug with 'svn commit --changelist=...' where a conflicted path not
referenced by the changelist causes the commit to fail.  Leverage the
new conflict generation APIs introduced in r26565 to test this bug
(CHANGELIST_MATCHES): Add new macro for common conditional.

of a specified changelist.  Use CHANGELIST_MATCHES() macro to
